Welcome to CatEatPad’s documentation!¶

class flaskr.info.ImageInfo¶

This class encapsulates all the relevant operations related to image file.

static add_new_image(file, savepath)¶

add a new image to the database, and will get the unique image id.

Parameters

  • file (FILE type, can retrieve content and filename from it) – the image file

  • savepath (string) – the local relevant saving path

Returns

unique image id

Return type

int

static delete_image(image_id)¶

given the unique image id, delete the record related to the image in the database

Parameters

image_id (int) – unique image id in the database

static get_image_by_id(image_id)¶

given a unique image id, retrieve all the relevant information about the image.

Parameters

image_id (int) – the unique image id

Returns

a dictionary of all the information about an image, including filename location, created time, and file hash value

Return type

dictionary

class flaskr.info.UserInfo(uid=- 1, uname='', pets=[], image=None, email=None, register_date=None)¶

The class representing a User, and provides all the relevant operations with database.

static add_new_user(username, password, email)¶

Add a new user with the given information to the database

Parameters

  • username (string) – the new user’s username

  • password (string) – the new user’s password

  • email (string) – the new user’s email

Returns

the new user’s unique id

Return type

int

static check_if_username_exist(username)¶

[summary]

Parameters

username ([type]) – [description]

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]

static get_login_info(form, correct_imagecode)¶

Get user information stored in database with the given form that contains username, password and the verification code if the verification code and password matches. Otherwise, return null user information and error message.

Parameters

  • form (dictionary) – contains username, password, imagecode

  • correct_imagecode (string) – this will be used to compared with the imagecode in the form

Returns

user_info(the user information stored in database, if doesn’t exist or match failure, return none), error (if error occur, return error message, otherwise return None)

Return type

dictionary / None, string / None

static get_user_info_by_uid(uid)¶

Get user information of given user id

Parameters

uid (int) – user’s unique id

Returns

all the user’s information (including the pets information) if retrieve from database successfully, otherwise return None

Return type

dictionary / None

static get_user_info_by_username(username)¶

Get user information of given username

Parameters

username (string) – user’s username

Returns

all the user’s information (including the pets information) if retrieve from database successfully, otherwise return None

Return type

dictionary / None

class flaskr.info.PetInfo(pid=- 1, plocation='', pstart=None, pend=None, pweight=- 1, p_age=- 1, ptype='', pdescription='', pimage=None)¶

The class representing a pet, and provides all the relevant operations with database.

static add_new_pet(form, file)¶

Add a new pet with the given information to the database if the date range is valid. Otherwise, return error message.

Parameters

  • form (dictionary) – the information about the pet, contains owner id, age, weight, type, city, description, startdate, enddate

  • file (FILE type) – the image file of the pet

Returns

pet_id (the unique pet id), error (error message if date range is not valid)

Return type

int / None, None / string

static delete_pet(pet_id)¶

Delete a certain pet’s information in the database

Parameters

pet_id (int) – the unique pet id

static get_pet_for_view(pet_id)¶

Get the pet information given a unique pet id

Parameters

pet_id (int) – the unique pet id

Returns

all the information related to the pet

Return type

dictionary

static get_pets(form={})¶

return the pets information in the database that satisfies given requirements in the form if the date range is valid. Otherwise, return error message

Parameters

form (dict, optional) – contains filter requirement, like type, city, startdate, enddate, defaults to {}

Returns

pets (a list of all the pets information), error (error message if the date range is invalid)

Return type

list, string / None

static get_pets_by_uid(uid)¶

Get all the owned pet information of a given user id

Parameters

uid (int) – user’s unique id

Returns

a list of the user’s pets information

Return type

list

class flaskr.info.ReplyInfo¶

The class representing a reply message, and provides all the relevant operations with database.

static add_reply(form, pet_id)¶

add a reply to the pet

Parameters

  • form (dictionary) – contains all the information related to the reply, like the reply content, and the creator

  • pet_id (int) – unique pet id that the reply is targeted for

Returns

the unique reply id

Return type

int

static delete_reply(reply_id)¶

delete a certain reply

Parameters

reply_id (int) – the unique reply id

static delete_reply_by_pet_id(pet_id)¶

delete all the replies related to a pet

Parameters

pet_id (int) – the unique pet id

static get_reply_by_pid(pet_id)¶

Get all the replies related to a pet

Parameters

pet_id (int) – the unique pet id

Returns

all the replies for the pet

Return type

list
